snippet: In a joint operation, federal law enforcement officials on Monday morning arrested 25 people suspected of human smuggling on a fishing boat off the coast of Southern California, the authorities announced.
abstract: Joint operation of federal law enforcement officials leads to arrest of 25 people suspected of human smuggling on fishing boat off coast of Southern California.
lead_paragraph: In a joint operation, federal law enforcement officials on Monday morning arrested 25 people suspected of human smuggling on a fishing boat off the coast of Southern California, the authorities announced.

headline.seo: California: 25 Arrested Off Coast in Suspected Smuggling Case
headline.main: California: 25 Arrested Off Coast in Suspected Smuggling Case
headline.print_headline: California: 25 Arrested Off Coast In Suspected Smuggling Case
